name: Cave and Enemy
description:
*~ Made for Metroidvania Month 18 ~*

Jam page: https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-18

Art assets used: https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/huge-pixelart-asset-pack

Run, jump, shoot, and use 3 different abilities to explore 4 levels in this short n' sweet Metroidvania.  Hope you enjoy :)

-- Controls --

Arrow keys to move

Z to jump

X to shoot/use ability

A and S to switch active ability

Unzip the folder and run "Cave and Enemy.exe" to play
